messages.title: A BRIGHTER FUTURE FOR WEST BERKSHIRE
messages.content: Every vote for the Liberal Democrats is a vote to stop Brexit and build a brighter future.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Lee Dillon is the only candidate endorsed by 'Best for Britain' and 'Berkshire for Europe'

issues.brexitEurope: Every vote for the Liberal Democrats is a vote to stop Brexit and build a brighter future. Lee Dillon supports a People's Vote with the option to remain in the EU and will do everything he can to stop Brexit.

leaflet.personalStatement: I support a People's Vote with the option to remain in the EU and will do everything I can to fight for our place in Europe and to stop Brexit.

endorsements.endorser: Max Hastings, former Editor-in-Chief, The Telegraph
endorsements.endorsement: I support Lee Dillon to become MP for Newbury because like many other disillusioned Tories in the constituency, I believe that a party of Brexit and Boris Johnson is no place for moderate Tories.

quotes.text: I support Lee Dillon to become MP for Newbury because like many other disillusioned Tories in the constituency, I believe that a party of Brexit and Boris Johnson is no place for moderate Tories.
quotes.source: Max Hastings, former Editor-in-Chief, The Telegraph

images.caption: Lee Dillon, Your parliamentary candidate for Newbury
